alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Hancock; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 8:25PM CDT until April 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Worth County in north central Iowa... Northeastern Hancock County in north central Iowa... Northern Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... Southeastern Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 825 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Rice Lake, or 8 miles southwest of Northwood, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Northwood around 835 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 197 and 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Iowa.
